message.body: Can you and d come up for New Years?!?!?!? Epic gun shabang

I'll try to pry an answer out of her. She hates making these decisions because she's always afraid that I'll go along with it no matter what but be disappointed. She's silly. It's hard for me to ask her these things but I'll try.
Ok well we will take whatever we get, New Years or beyond
She wants to go but might have trouble with work scheduling. They make next week's schedule tomorrow so hopefully we'll know soon. I really wanna go!
